lyrics.stanza: Christ to minister is service Both to God and others too, Christ, the surplus, e'er supplying, Off'ring Him as service true.
Christ to minister is service Both to God and others too, Christ, the surplus, e'er supplying, Off'ring Him as service true.
As the Israelites did offer From the surplus of their land, Thus some produce reaped of Jesus Must be in our serving hand.
We on Christ, as land, must labor, Harvest Him for all our fare; Tasting Him to overflowing, Christ with others we may share.
Holding Christ, as members growing, Each his function must observe; Christ receiving, Christ partaking, To His Body Christ we serve.
Fellowship and testimony, Ministry and worship too, In all helps and ministrations Christ is all our service true.
